body_html:
Hello @lilichu! Several solutions in this:

  • Use python version on conda. example ~/anaconda2/bin/python script.py
  • Change default python version.
  • add path for caffe2 library. my path: ~/anaconda2/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/caffe2
    you path probably: ~/anaconda2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/caffe2

I do not understand this well, but think it will help.

body:
Hello @lilichu!  Several solutions in this:
- Use python version on conda.  example  ~/anaconda2/bin/python script.py
- Change default python version.
- add path for caffe2 library. my path: ~/anaconda2/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/caffe2
you path probably: ~/anaconda2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/caffe2

I do not understand this well, but think it will help.
